verses.name: Judges 2:13
verses.text: And they forsook the Lord, and served Baal and Ashtaroth.

verses.name: Judges 2:14
verses.text: And the anger of the Lord was hot against Israel, and he delivered them into the hands of spoilers that spoiled them, and he sold them into the hands of their enemies round about, so that they could not any longer stand before their enemies.

verses.name: Judges 2:15
verses.text: Whithersoever they went out, the hand of the Lord was against them for evil, as the Lord had said, and as the Lord had sworn unto them: and they were greatly distressed.
